result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Joe Anderson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Michael Joe Anderson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Michael Joe Anderson was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

pd on 08-30-2016 with ck#00700-2121 for $273.33. gme

DE is still making mo. pmts for Atty. bill. gme
c: Def, Atty, DA & SCSO. eif

DE appeared at counter after his hearing inquiring about Pplan.  DE was advised to continue his Atty Fee Pplan until he receives his final Atty bill in the mail.  DE pd his May pymt today & was advised that his next pymt is due 6-26-16. jaf

Apprs: CO: HWC for SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Matthew L Hartung  DF ATTY: James H Krave DF:  Michael Joe Anderson appeared. Case called at 9:22. Atty. Krave updates the court as to the agreement.   Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads G to Ct 1  in16CM11. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 1 in 16CM11. On motion of the State, Crt dismisses Ct  2 in 16CM11. Sentencing arguments. Crt orders: 
- Costs of $243.00
- Submit DNA sample and pay surcharge $200.00.
DE will continue with the payment.
Status conference on May 9, 2016 at 09:15 am.

Apprs: CO Proctor for SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA:  Megan E. Kelly DF ATTY: James H Krave DF: Michael Joe Anderson appeared. Case called at 10:59. Atty. Krave updates the court and requests to reset. ADA Kelly agrees. Bonds continue.  Status conference scheduled for May 9, 2016 at 09:15 am.
Order for payment on May 2, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
From JA to parties. Re: appointment of counsel. km
Pre-trial conference on March 24, 2016 at 10:45 am.
FOR ATTY FEES.  DE to pay $50/mo comm 3-26-16.  Pplan Fee waived.  DE signed Pet for Appt of Atty and will be mailed an Order for Pymt. jaf

records.addlTxt:
Prior to leaving the courthouse, report to St Croix County Jail for mugshots and fingerprints.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. Defendant must pay $5.00 fee at time of each UA test with an officer of the same sex.

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:  Matthew L Hartung,  DF ATTY:  Brian Thomas Smestad for today, DF:  Michael Joe Anderson appeared. Defendant does not qualify for PD - PFAC. Court confirms address.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG.  Waives speedy trial.
